TextBlock.Text: HYACINTH: Ok, that isn't going to work. I should keep in mind next time that it's hard to speak underwater.
Anyways... this cave is cool! This species is thriving down here and no one even knows I'm present (they are busy at mining site 2b).
The dark, cool surroundings remind me of my little rock way out there, though oxygen is much more scarce there.
I should probably sneak into mining site 2b for my little project.
Even if they work long and hard on this project, every Nomai goes to sleep at some point.
